channel.title: [Fast] Building websites cheep [Fast]
channel.description:
Im using my knowledgeable of JavaScript XHTML5, PHP, and MySQL to build sites for people at a cheep price (read note below) webpages dont have to be RS Themed if requested, i also do custom forums (software built from scratch) user systems ect if interested, PM me or add me on skype: exotiicdeath
I will not discus a price on moparscape as the rules say we cant sell anything over there forum, so il have to message you via a 3rd party application (e.g skype)
*Please note, all packages do not come with there own hosting or domain, i will only provide the design & code

item.title: [Fast] Building websites cheep [Fast]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Sorry, but if you don’t know the difference between ‘their’ and ‘there’ or ‘cheap’ and ‘cheep’, no one is going to take you seriously.

Anyways, locked because you are selling your service which is clearly against the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: [Fast] Building websites cheep [Fast]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Bellend, post:7, topic:478792”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=597010.msg4203997#msg4203997 date=1358642904]

If you had bothered to read the rules you’d realise there’s no payments to be organised through MoparScape, therefore you can’t sell your virtual goods here. People who are purchasing also have no proof you’re a competent website developer to do any of this.

and if you read the post you would see im not selling anything via moparscape…

Which you changed after I told you about that rule. In my eyes you’re still organising someone to contact you about payments for a website, that’s still against the rules. All help comes free on MoparScape or any sister site.

well there’s several things wrong in your statement #1 its in your eyes, #2 its not help #3 organising someone to contact me via skype which then COULD lead to payment made has nothing to do with mopar even remotely #4 “All help comes free on MoparScape or any sister site.” -> i haven’t offered anything for a price yet so its declared free

There’ll be a moderator who I can see having the exact same views as me coming and locking this soon. Just for the record of you wanting a payment: http://puu.sh/1PTD4
[/quote]

are you reading my posts correctly? obviously im wanting a payment, but if you read the rules you will find that no transaction is allowed on Moparscape and all help is to be given free of charge, now that’s MOPARSCAPES ToS, if someone add’s me on skype and we discuss a payment that’s NOTHING to do with Moparscape… and if we re-call my thread you will see that im not making a transaction im just enquiring if anyone would be interested. if you want to stop scenarios like this i would suggest updating your ToS again because im doing nothing wrong here according to the rules.[/quote]
I think you’ll find you’re more or less following the loopholes in the rules themselves where as the foreword in the rules clearly states:

Foreword:

The staff reserve the right to interpret these rules any way they see fit. The following rules are more like guidelines. You shouldn’t be looking for loopholes in them, rather, you should just get along with them. We’re looking for users that use common sense. For example, we would prefer a user that knows, just because something isn’t on the rules, that it it isn’t necessarily allowed

I’m not here to be a dick, I myself used to freelance a lot and it was hard to get your name out there. However, I really don’t think this is the place.

Read full topic

item.title: [Fast] Building websites cheep [Fast]
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:6, topic:478792”][quote author=Bellend link=topic=597010.msg4203994#msg4203994 date=1358642595]

If you had bothered to read the rules you’d realise there’s no payments to be organised through MoparScape, therefore you can’t sell your virtual goods here. People who are purchasing also have no proof you’re a competent website developer to do any of this.

and if you read the post you would see im not selling anything via moparscape…

Which you changed after I told you about that rule. In my eyes you’re still organising someone to contact you about payments for a website, that’s still against the rules. All help comes free on MoparScape or any sister site.

well there’s several things wrong in your statement #1 its in your eyes, #2 its not help #3 organising someone to contact me via skype which then COULD lead to payment made has nothing to do with mopar even remotely #4 “All help comes free on MoparScape or any sister site.” -> i haven’t offered anything for a price yet so its declared free
[/quote]
There’ll be a moderator who I can see having the exact same views as me coming and locking this soon. Just for the record of you wanting a payment: http://puu.sh/1PTD4[/quote]

are you reading my posts correctly? obviously im wanting a payment, but if you read the rules you will find that no transaction is allowed on Moparscape and all help is to be given free of charge, now that’s MOPARSCAPES ToS, if someone add’s me on skype and we discuss a payment that’s NOTHING to do with Moparscape… and if we re-call my thread you will see that im not making a transaction im just enquiring if anyone would be interested. if you want to stop scenarios like this i would suggest updating your ToS again because im doing nothing wrong here according to the rules.

P.S i removed the payment part as i remembered that i couldn’t sell anything on here… not because i was trying to hide anything, as i state quite clearly we would negotiate on skype

Read full topic
